resources.string: Search our Vehicle Parts Guide for the exact parts for the vehicle you need, by selecting an option from each of the categories.\n\nWe are constantly adding new vehicles and parts to the list, but in case you cannot see the vehicle you need, feel free to call us by clicking on the Call button on the top right hand corner of this screen, and speak to one of our tech staff. P.:1800 15 15 15

Search our Hose Fitting Guide for the exact parts for the vehicle you need, by selecting an option from each of the categories.\n\nWe are constantly adding new parts to the list, but in case you cannot see the part you need, feel free to call us by clicking on the Call button on the top right hand corner of this screen, and speak to one of our tech staff for more help. P.:1800 15 15 15

PLEASE NOTE:\nThe refrigerant charge specifications quoted in the Highgate R134a Gas Charge Guide are a guide for OEM systems. All the normal procedure, care and criteria for charging a system MUST be observed. Modifications and changes to components may alter the refrigerant charge requirements of the system. No responsibility will be accepted for system or component damage arising from, or as a result of, the use of the refrigerant charge information in this guide. If you cannot find the information for the vehicle you require, please do not hesitate in call use on 1800 15 15 15, we are here to help!

We will begin processing your order, and send you an e-mail order confirmation shortly.\n\n Depending on your account type you may also receive a payment confirmation phone call from one of our friendly sales staff.
Sorry, your cart is empty!\nPlease add some products to the cart.

eWAY Payment Gateway.

to view our eWAY Security Seal.
